system.description:
You have achieved true balance between mind and body, the two functioning as a single unified whole. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your choice of your Intelligence or Dexterity score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • You gain 5 additional skill specialties, which may be taken in any skill you are proficient with from the adept or scholar skill lists.
  • You also gain one bonus Scholar's Discovery and one Practiced Technique, and any time you would gain one of these features in the future, you may choose one of the other instead.
